text.p: IntegraMed America Inc said Tuesday the registration of 6.4 million shares of common stock was made effective.
The offering is a direct placement to selected institutional and other investors and is being managed by Vector Securities International Inc as placement agent. Closing is scheduled for August 15.
Proceeds are expected to total about $9.6 million, according to a news release issued by Integramed.
About $6.6 million of the proceeds will be used for the previously announced asset purchase and right-to-manage agreement with Fertility Centers of Illinois, South Carolina.
The balance of the proceeds of this offering will be used for working capital and other general corporate purposes.
